mapper.select: SELECT id, name, theme, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at FROM contests WHERE status IN ('UPCOMING', 'IN_PROGRESS') ORDER BY start_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contests (name, theme, start_date, end_date, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{theme}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, theme, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at FROM contests WHERE end_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AND status = 'IN_PROGRESS' ORDER BY end_date ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE contests SET status = #{newStatus, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE id = #{contestId}
